title: Site da Priscila - Frontend
fullDescription: Frontend of a website for Teacher Priscila of UFPR, made with Javascript, HTML and CSS, in addition to Bootstrap. It's hosted on Netlify, where you can check it out: https://profpriscila.netlify.app/

title: Site da Priscila - Backend
fullDescription: Backend of Teacher Priscila website, hosted on Azure, made with Node.js and MongoDB with routes for users, classes and scripts.
